```{r}
#HandShake Function
library(FRACTION); 
library(plotrix); 
library(pracma); 

is.wholenumber = function(x, tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.5)
{
  abs(x - round(x)) < tol; 
}
is.wholenumber(1)

handShake = function(n = 1, plotMe = TRUE)
{
  if(n < 1)
  {
    stop("Error"); 
  }
  
  if(!is.wholenumber(n))
  {
    stop("n must be an integer"); 
  }
  
  h = n*(n-1)/2;
  
  if(plotMe)
  {
    plot(0,0, type = "n", main = paste0(h, " Handshakes for ", n," People"), xlim = c(-6,6), ylim = c(-6,6), asp = 1, xlab = "", ylab = "", xaxt = "n", yaxt = "n", bty = "n"); 
      z = matrix(0, n, 2); 
      draw.circle(0,0,1); 
      x = 0; 
      y = 0; 
      
      points(x,y);
      #xs = c(xs, x); 
      #ys = c(ys, y); 
      
      for(i in 1:n) #points
      {
        x = round(cos(2 * pi * i/n), digits = 4); 
        y = round(sin(2 * pi * i/n), digits = 4); 
        #xn = x * cos(deg2rad(angle)) - y * sin(deg2rad(angle)); 
        #yn = y * cos(deg2rad(angle)) - x * sin(deg2rad(angle)); 
        points(x = x, y = y, cex = 3); 
        z[i,1] = x; 
        z[i,2] = y; 
      
      }
      
      #drawing a line segment from source to target
      for(j in 1:n) #source
      {
        for(k in 1:n) #target
        {
          segments(z[j,1], z[j,2], z[k,1], z[k,2]); 
        }
      }
  }
  
  h; 
}
```

#function for counting letters of alaphabet for documents 
countingFreqLetters <- function(f, l)
{
  d <- read.delim(f, header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, allowEscapes = FALSE, quote = "")
  count <- table(strsplit(paste0(d[,], collapse = ""), ""))
  if(l)
  {
    count[names(count)%in%c(letters, letters)]
  }else{
    count
  }
}
